definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentences.chinese: 添加正确的水量和组装的过滤器。

sentences.english: You've now finished configuring the assembly diagram.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经完成了组装关系图的配置。

sentences.english: Interface of a screw lock assembly areas.
sentences.chinese: 接口处一颗螺丝锁定，组装方面。

sentences.english: The devices are often combined on dredges.
sentences.chinese: 这些设备都组装在采砂船上。

sentences.english: It seems likely that disks are assembled and based at Pine Gap.
sentences.chinese: 看起来似乎磁盘组装和基础松树峡口。

sentences.english: It must be a toy car that(which) can be assembled.
sentences.chinese: 一定是个能组装的玩具车。

sentences.english: Sound is like clay that he sculpts to his purpose.
sentences.chinese: 声波很喜欢这个按个人意图由自己组装而成的身体。

sentences.english: A workbench is set up to assemble analog cameras in the Leica assembly room.
sentences.chinese: 在徕卡的装配车间里，安置着组装类似相机的工作台。

sentences.english: The constellation Vulpecula is a veritable entire assembly line of newborn stars.
sentences.chinese: 整个狐狸星座是一条真正新生恒星的组装线。

sentences.english: The research on self-assembly monomolecular films has been extensively concerned in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 自组装单分子膜的研究是近年来倍受关注的研究领域。

sentences.english: He build himself a car in his spare time.
sentences.chinese: 他在工余时间自己组装了一辆汽车。

sentences.english: This CDL tool is very easy to assemble and operate.
sentences.chinese: CDL测井仪打捞工具现场组装快捷，操作方便。

sentences.english: Splicing row can be assembled on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 列架可采用通用件现场组装，外形美观。

sentences.english: Bock compressors are manufactured on the latest generation of production and assembly plant.
sentences.chinese: 我们的压缩机应用最先进的生产和组装设备制造而成。

sentences.english: Jingang guardrails adopt the solderless combined type of design which can be installed quickly and easily.
sentences.chinese: 金钢护栏采用无焊组装式的设计，安装快捷简单。

sentences.english: The first two modules of the International Space Station were assembled in December 1998. In the foreground is the Unity module, which was built by the United States.
sentences.chinese: 空间站最早的两个舱是在1998年组装的。

definition: to change one's costume/to repackage/to remodel/to refit/to modify/to convert
to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
